replies.bodyText:
Comment them out so that splice can be started w/o building ee branch, because SpliceReplication is only available on ee branch. Without commenting them out, the following command will fail
./start-splice-cluster -pcdh6.3.0
You have to always build with ee branch
start-splice-cluster -pcdh6.3.0,ee
replies.author: jyuanca
